DataElement.preferredName: Password Policy Computer Configuration Lower Case Letter Required Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A secret set of characters, numbers, or symbols used as a form of authentication.:A plan of action adopted by an individual or social group.:Refers to 1) the way a computer's operating system is set up, 2) the total combination of hardware components that make up the computer system, or 3) the specific software settings that have been established for the system._Any of the small, non-capital alphabetic letters.:Necessary, not optional.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

Concepts.definition: A secret set of characters, numbers, or symbols used as a form of authentication.
A plan of action adopted by an individual or social group.

Refers to 1) the way a computer's operating system is set up, 2) the total combination of hardware components that make up the computer system, or 3) the specific software settings that have been established for the system.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any of the small, non-capital alphabetic letters.:Necessary, not optional.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Any of the small, non-capital alphabetic letters.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
